oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Caroline Scarlett
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Delbridge Studio
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Caroline Scarlett, the wife of Melvin G. Scarlett, who was president of MTSU 1968-1978. “At times, the demands on the First Family are so great, that the President w[ould] attend one campus activity and Mrs. Scarlett the other” (Midlander, 1971).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scarlett, Caroline; College presidents' spouses; Middle Tennessee State College; Middle Tennessee State University
